definition: to knock against/to knock together/to rattle

sentences.english: Now it looks like something analogous has hit the global financial markets.
sentences.chinese: 現在看來似乎某些類似的東西已碰擊了全球金融市場。

sentences.english: We could hear the rattle of milk bottles.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以聽到牛奶瓶的碰擊聲。

sentences.english: Like as the waves make towards the pebbled shore.
sentences.chinese: 猶如波浪向充滿卵石的岸邊碰擊一樣。

sentences.english: Pots and pans were clattering in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 盆子和鍋在廚房裏碰擊作響。

sentences.english: The weapon discharged when it hit the ground.
